data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: What is one news story that you remember hearing about recently? What stuck with you about these events? Why do you think the story was news-worthy?
data.answer: I remember hearing about a news story last week which is kind of funny. A man in France has accidentally blown up part of his house while trying to chase a fly with an electric swat. A reaction occurred between the swat and the leaking gas at his home, causing an explosion and part of his kitchen to blow up. The blast also damaged a section of his roof and the house is currently uninhabitable. Somehow the man managed to escape the catastrophe with just a burn to his hand. As to why this story was news-worthy, I suppose it was because no such thing had ever happened before - a coincidentally weird but highly dangerous incident resulted from an ordinary, daily practice with a surprising ending. And this is what stuck with me about the incidence. (137字)
